body.name: Dash Cam FHD 1080P Car Camera, Front Dash Camera for Cars, 3"/30fps Recording Car DVR Cam 176° Wide Angle, Night Vision, Parking Monitor, G-Sensor, 64G SD Card, Type C
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 38 mins
features: FHD 1080P Clarity - Experience pristine video quality with our FHD 1080P dash cam front, ensuring clear footage for a comprehensive record of your journeys

Night Vision - The dash cam's Night Vision feature automatically adjusts to varying light levels, maintaining optimal recording quality. This intelligent adjustment ensures reliable performance regardless of the ambient light conditions

Collision Protection - In the event of an impact, our dash cam ensures that specific recordings are promptly locked and protected from being overwritten. This ensures the preservation of crucial footage related to accidents or unexpected events, enhancing the reliability of our dash camera for cars

Parking Monitor - Enhance your vehicle's security with this feature. The dash camera automatically records brief videos upon detecting collisions or impacts while your car is parked. This provides crucial evidence in case of accidents or hit-and-runs. To enable 24/7 monitor, a separate dash cam hardwire kit (Not included) is required, ensuring a constant power supply and heightened protection for your parked vehicle

Seamless Loop Recording - Experience hassle-free recording with our dash cam loop recording. It automatically overwrites old files when storage is full, eliminating the need for manual intervention. This feature ensures car camera continuous recording, optimizing storage space with efficiency

Easy Setup - Effortless setup is key in our dash cam design. We value your time and strive to make the setup process straightforward. Insert the memory card, mount it on your windshield, and plug dashcam in the power – you're good to go
body.description: FHD 1080P Front Dash Cam - Q21 Warm Tips: The bracket allows a 360° rotation for an optimal road view It is also crafted for effortless removal from the windshield Ensure to format the SD card before commencing usage The dash cam features a 24-hour parking mode, but a hardwire kit is necessary for this function (not included) Package Content: 1X Dash Cam 1X Suction Mount 1X Car Charger 1X SD Card Reader 1X 64G Micro SD Card 1X Install Stick 1X User Manual

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q21 Dash Cam Front FHD 1080P with 64G Card - Easy to Install It captures a wide-angle view of the road, documenting your journey. Equipped with loop recording, it overwrites old files to ensure continuous recording. Feature G-sensors that detect collisions and automatically lock the footage to prevent overwriting. Q21 dash cams are powered through the vehicle's cigarette lighter and save recordings on a removable SD card. It also has parking mode, camera will automatically records brief videos upon detecting collisions or impacts while your car is parked.Tips: To enable 24/7 monitor, a separate dash cam hardwire kit (Not included) is required, ensuring a constant power supply and heightened protection for your parked vehicle

"We craft dependable dash cams for your peace of mind. Simple to use, our cameras capture every journey, ensuring safety on the road. Trust us for straightforward solutions to safeguard your drive." FHD 1080P Front Dash Cam - Q21 Warm Tips: The bracket allows a 360° rotation for an optimal road view It is also crafted for effortless removal from the windshield Ensure to format the SD card before commencing usage The dash cam features a 24-hour parking mode, but a hardwire kit is necessary for this function (not included) Package Content: 1X Dash Cam 1X Suction Mount 1X Car Charger 1X SD Card Reader 1X 64G Micro SD Card 1X Install Stick 1X User Manual

WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) in our dash cam ensures clear footage by balancing exposure, preventing overexposed highlights or underexposed shadows, offering optimal visibility in diverse driving environments Enable continuous recording with the loop recording function. The dash cam overwrites the oldest videos when the SD card is full, and you can customize the video file length to through settings The dash camera automatically records brief videos upon detecting collisions or impacts while your car is parked. To enable 24/7 monitor, a separate dash cam hardwire kit (Not included) is required, ensuring a constant power supply and heightened protection for your parked vehicle

The built-in G-sensor in the Q21 dash camera automatically detects sudden shakes or collisions. It locks the footage, preventing overwriting even in loop recording This dash cam features a 176° wide-angle lens, reducing blind spots and capturing more details to faithfully preserve the real scene The package included 64G micro sd card. Please format the card on camera or pc before first time using
Spefication: Video Resolution 1080P(1920x1080) Camera Angle 176° Memory Card 64G Included Video Format AVI Display 3" IPS Battery 200mA Lithium ion polymer Input Solt Type C Parking Mode Support

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thrilled with my new dashcam! The quality is top-notch, installation was a breeze, and the onboard camera impressively auto-records collisions. The high-quality video, wide-angle lens, and night vision capabilities exceeded my expectations. Overall, incredible value for a performance-packed product. Highly satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Front Dash Camera is so easy to use that I installed it in my car so that I no longer have to worry about being unclear about what happened in the event of an accident, because the dash cam records everything, and I feel much more at ease while driving this way. The picture quality of the driving recorder is very clear, the picture angle is very large, and it can record a very wide field of view. It is very practical and the price is very cost-effective. It is a very good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The video quality is excellent, capturing clear and detailed footage even in low light conditions. The wide-angle lens provides a comprehensive view of the road, ensuring that nothing is missed. Great for detecting and saving footage during unexpected events. Setup was a breeze, and the user-friendly interface makes it easy to navigate settings. Overall, this dash cam offers peace of mind on the road, and I highly recommend it for its reliability and impressive features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Dash Cam for Peace of Mind
reviews.reviewText: This FHD 1080P Car Camera is a game-changer! The clarity is impressive, capturing every detail on the road. Easy to install and operate, it adds an extra layer of security to my drives. Sturdy build and duty performance make it a must-have for any car owner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear Quality and Wide Angle Feature
reviews.reviewText: I’ve waited a whole 2 weeks after purchasing this product to do a honest review. This does not compare to my first dash cam that I purchased. This one has a wide angle feature, where it captures some of the areas that you don’t usually see in a typical dash cam setting. This is an important safety feature, as you want to make sure you get every shot possible.Setting up took no more than 15 minutes. I was able to follow through with the instructions with no problem. The suction on the dash cam, that allows it to be uphold on the windshield is such a life saver. I’ve gone through speed bumps and potholes, and the dash cam has not fallen out.The quality was super clear and not pixelated. When I turn my car on, it automatically turns on and begins recording already.One key feature is how compact yet large the screen is on the dash cam, making it super visible to see every part of the camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my new Honda Passport and it works properly. Large screen, wide angle and protection for emergency record, it has all necessary functions for a dash camera and the price is reasonable. Easy to install and use, will recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Great Dash Cam for Everyday Use!"
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Dash Cam FHD 1080P Car Camera, and it's been a fantastic addition to my car. The video quality is crisp, and the installation was a breeze. It's user-friendly, making it perfect for everyday drivers. A reliable and affordable choice for those looking for a reliable front dash camera. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does it job perfectly
reviews.reviewText: The dash cam impresses with its sleek design, robust build, and outstanding performance. The high-resolution lens captures crystal-clear footage day or night, and the wide-angle view ensures comprehensive coverage. Advanced safety features like the G-sensor and collision warnings enhance road safety.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good value and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The full HD dash cam exceeded my expectations with its crystal-clear video quality, capturing every detail on the road. Its wide-angle lens ensures a comprehensive view, while the seamless loop recording feature provides continuous coverage. The device's compact design and easy installation make it a user-friendly choice. Additionally, the G-sensor technology automatically saves crucial footage during sudden impacts, enhancing overall safety. Overall, a reliable and high-performance dash cam for peace of mind on the road

Esta cámara de coche te ofrece una excelente calidad de imagen y sonido. Tiene una resolución de 1080 pixeles, una pantalla de 3 pulgadas y el gran angular de 176° que captura todos los detalles del viaje en carretera. Además, tiene funciones como la grabación en Bucle (sobre escribir cuando se llena la tarjeta) , el sensor G, la visión nocturna y el WDR que garantizan una grabación continua y clara en cualquier condición. Viene con una tarjeta SD de 64 GB ya incluida y un lector USB que facilitan el almacenamiento y la transferencia de los vídeos. Es una cámara de coche fácil de instalar, configurar y usar, y tiene un buen servicio postventa. La recomiendo para los que buscan una cámara de coche de alta calidad y a buen precio.

Ho acquistato questa dash cam e posso dire che ha superato le mie aspettative. L'installazione è stata rapida e semplice, grazie anche al kit fornito che includeva tutto il necessario. La dash cam è piccola e discreta, non ingombra la visuale e si adatta bene all'interno dell'auto. Ho trovato particolarmente utile la funzione di rilevamento collisioni e la modalità parcheggio, che mi dà sicurezza quando l'auto è ferma. La qualità video, soprattutto considerando il prezzo, è buona. Inoltre, la dash cam è dotata di una batteria interna che assicura la registrazione anche in caso di interruzione dell'alimentazione esterna.

Die Dashcam mit Bildschirm und Saugnapf-Befestigung überzeugt durch ihre einfache Installation und Benutzerfreundlichkeit. Der Saugnapf haftet sicher an der Windschutzscheibe, während der integrierte Bildschirm klare Aufnahmen ermöglicht. Die Videoqualität ist beeindruckend, besonders bei Tageslicht. Die Bedienung ist intuitiv, und die Kamera bietet nützliche Funktionen wie Loop-Aufnahme und G-Sensor. Ein solides Produkt für jeden, der eine zuverlässige Dashcam sucht.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely pleased with this Dash Cam. The 1080P FHD quality and wide-angle lens provide crystal-clear footage. The included 64GB SD card is a great bonus. Night vision and G-Sensor features add security, and the loop recording ensures I never miss a moment. An excellent investment for any driver!
